English: Restore Ottoman rule in Egypt
Egypt has broken away from us after a relatively succesful campaign of Napoleon the Great in land of the pharoes, but the time has come to get it back
Domination in the Maghreb
As the sole muslim great power we should protect our brothers in faith in the Maghreb
Expand the Confederacy
Although we have faced setbacks from the British, the time has come to once again reassert our dominion over India
Restore the Mughal Empire
The Mughal Empire has barely recovered off of it's giant losses in the 18th century, but now we stand again as a glorious nation and we shall claim our place in the sun
Incorporate Peru
Let us expand and continue the Bolivarian dream of a united Latin American republic, starting with the incorporation of Peru
United Latin American Republic!
Bolivar's dream is so close to being achieved, finally we may stay equal to the great powers of the world as he wished
Acquire Cuba
We should try to bargain with our spanish friend to get the Island of Cuba as it's mush closer to our border than theirs!
Regno unii
One Empire, two nations, one objective - expansion to liberate our brothers of foreign yoke
Move capital to Rio
We should move our capital to Rio, i heard you can meet a monke there
Restore the Persian Empire
Lands ripped away from us centuries ago are ought to be returned now that we're much more powerful
Restore the Spanish Empire in Europe
Lands ripped away from us centuries ago are ought to be returned now that we're much more powerful
Restore the Swedish Empire
It is time for the return of a great Swedish Empire! Let us restore the legacy of Gustavus Adolphus and bring it to new heights!
Partition Poland
We should repartition Poland again, they can't seem to govern themselves anyway
Restore the lands beyond the Rhine
After the Congress of Vienna, we lost rightful German land in the Rhineland.. Thankfully, we can now amend that mistake.
Unite the Kingdom of Westphalia
Many princedoms were given to us after the death of Napoleon the Great, the time has come to incorporate them properly into our realm
Westphalia has been consolidated
Form the Rhine Confederacy
Our dominant position in the area and favor with the French allow us to unite the German lands peacefully with a promise to coexist with our western neighbour
Create the Rhine Confederacy
Years ago Napoleon the Great created the Confederation of the Rhine, and now it is our job to help them unite under a single banner as they'll surely prove to be a great ally.
Assume the Crown of Italy
With Italy under our control, we can safely consider ourselves a real Kingdom of Italy.
Form Two Sicilies
Our dominant position in the area allows us to call ourselves "The Kingdom of Two Sicilies"
United Netherlands
Our dominant position in the area allows us to call ourselves "The United Kingdom of the Netherlands"
Partition Poland
We should repartition Poland again, they can't seem to govern themselves anyway
Restore what's ours
The proud Prussian people have endured living in a French-dominated world for too long! Now starts our rise to greatness!
Repartition Lithuania
We should repartition Lithuania again, they can't seem to govern themselves anyway
Conquer §BFinland§!
Acquiring Finland is of vital use to us as it protects our exposed capital.  This will lock you out of accepting other cultures.
Coronation of Napoleon III
Give up the Cause
We have failed to return to our original lands, perhaps we should establish a new Kingdom and begin a new journey to glory?
Napoleon's Legacy

The foolish compromises of Napoleon II have forced us to grant concessions to other European nations for the sake of peace. This great betrayal must be amended, and the Legacy of Napoleon the Great must be reborn!
The Danzig Coup

The republic of Danzig is staffed with officials friendly to us, our king must merely lift his finger and an annexation bill is sure to come. Let us erase this disgusting by-product of the Napoleonic wars and return the city to its rightful owner.
Create The Central Industrial Region

The Central Industrial Region was one of the biggest economic projects of the Poland. The 5-year-long project was initiated by a famous Polish economist, deputy Prime Minister and Minister of the Treasury, Eugeniusz Kwiatkowski. Its goal was to create a heavy industrial center in the middle of the country, as far as possible from any borders, strengthen the Polish economy and reduce unemployment.
Retake the Indian Treaty Ports

For ages, the Indian subcontinent has been plagued by the most terrifying disease - Europeans. With our control over South Asia solidified, we can afford to consolidate our power even more - and even attempt to drive out the Foreigners.
Form the Celtic Union
With our brothers under $COUNTRY_ADJ$ protection, we may finally embrace the Celtic identity and unite against England.
Finish What We Started!

With our nation sufficiently prepared against the English with the power of Big Chungus, now is the best time to strike. Let us liberate the people of Kernow and Manning!           ?YResearching Nationalism and Imperialism allows you to discover Manifest Destiny.?!
Recover Brittany!

Brittany had endured under the French boot for hundreds of years. With our status as a formidable European power confirmed, the first step to helping the Bretons is to assert our claim on the Peninsula.
Force another ?Ycountry?W to disarm
Form the United Provinces of Rio de La Plata

The nations which were once part of the Viceroyalty of Rio de La Plata must be reunited under a single flag once again, the platinean peoples bound together into a great nation, a power to rule in the New World, the United Provinces of Rio de La Plata.
Reclaim Louisiana!

With the pesky Cherokee blocking our access to lands that we rightfully bought from the French, our claim on the American Frontier didn't hold much ground. With that nuisance out of the way, though, we ought to renew our claim on American land!
Proclaim an United Indonesia

Our 'Mainland' possesions in the Lowlands are nothing more than a failed investment. With French, British, and even German eyes looking upon our land, it's time to discard our home and make a new one in the East Indies.           ?RThis will make you into Indonesia and put the Netherlands proper under an AI!?!
Push our Claims on the Philippine Archipelago!
With our useless land in Europe shed, we can focus more resources and attention on Asian affairs. The most pressing of which, the Spanish colony in the Philippines, should be dealt with accordingly.
Accept the Filipinos!
The Spanish colonial empire in Asia has been neutered, and the Filipino people have been liberated.
A large part of our country is a poor, jungle-y, uncivilized mess. With enough funding, we can alleviate this issue.
Fund the Poorest Parts of Indonesia
The §RCrusade for Canada§!

Our northern neighbors, the Canadians, are unjustly exploited by upstart British nobles, who ran from their home after the British Revolution. To achieve peace in the New World, this imperialism must be put to an end.
Take back our Eastern Claims!
After the disastrous Wars of the Coalition, our rightful land in the Kingdom of Galicia was stolen by the Polish-Lithuanian Commonwealth. This was a terrible mistake
French: and now it falls upon us to mend the situation.

English: Finish the New Partitions of Poland!
It has become apparent that the lords of Poland are utterly incompetent at administrating their own realm. There is no point in having them keep holding onto land that was once Austrian.
Reintegrate Illyria

After the Wars of the Coalition against Napoleon, we were forced to acknowledge an independent, 'Illyrian' state in Croatia, and therefore, Austrian territory. However, with France losing their power in the region, and our diplomats further accumulating influence, we are able to reintegrate Illyria into our country.
Poland is No More!
With the Polish-Lithuanian Commonwealth off the map, we can once and for all wipe the pretense of a powerful Union between Poles and Lithuanians
Expand our influence §Gin the western Mediterranean Sea§!
The withdrawal of the British in the western Mediterranean Sea created a power vacuum in the region and we must be the one to fill it!
Expand in Southern Italy

Now that we have secured a hold in Sicily and reestablished ourselves as a regional power, we should expand this influence in southern Italy and seize what was once a part of the glorious Spanish Empire!
Unite §WIberia§!
Now that we are united with Portugal and that we have reclaimed Catalonia, we can finally claim the union of all Iberians under one flag!
Give citizenship to §Rthe Caraibes§!

The Caraibes have been a part of Spain since the beginning of the 16th century and it was the place we began our glorious colonial empire from. Now, it's time to make these great islands a part of the Metropolie
Grant citizenship to the Phillipines
Now that Caraibes has been accepted, let's continue this propagation of citizenship to our last asian colonies, the Phillipines.
Reestablish the Spanish Armada
With the British fleet being divided there's place for the Spanish Armada to reestablish itself as one the strongest fleet in the world
Acceptance of the Central Americans
Now that we have seized Central America, we must keep this population in our country and as a new world nation, the best option is to give them citizenship!
We reign over the Bosniak crowns!
With Bosnia under our rule, we can add another crown to the empire of Austria-Hungary!
The Reconquest of Quebec

Quebec has, for many years, stayed under the control of the English. It is imperative that we take advantage of the current weak state of Canada - let Quebec, and the world, know that we are coming back for what is ours!
Reconquest of Prussia!
We have reconquered the region of Prussia, a legitimate region of the Polish-Lithuanian Commonwealth!
The Polish Patriots of Slask
We have saved the Poles from the Prussian imperialism in Slask!
Unite with the Galician Poles!
East and West Galician Poles are finally united under the flag of the Polish-Lithuanian Commonwealth, they don't need to fear the Austrian black eagle!
All Poles are united
We have finally ended the partition that begun two centuries ago and reestablished Poland's former glory and borders!
Expand our Germanic influence!
The pressure we put on Prussia gave us possibility to expand our influence in Germany
Expand our influence §Bin the Baltic§!!
We have subjugated the Baltics, we should give it's people citizenship to avoid revolts! This will lock you out of accepting other cultures.
Expand our influence §Bin the Baltic§!!
We have subjugated the Baltics, we should give it's people citizenship to avoid revolts! This will lock you out of accepting Hungarian cultures.
Form the §WBaltic Empire§!
We have united the Baltic people under one nation and we are ready to take our place as a great power!
Expand our German territory!
We must keep our hold on North Germany and pursuit the domination of the Baltic!
Continue the German Expansion!
Now that we established ourselves as a North German power, we must seek dominance over the whole North German region.
Continue the German Expansion!
Now that we established ourselves as a North German power, we must seek dominance over the whole North German region.
Holstein is ours!
Holstein is a legitime core of the Baltic Empire!
Russian expansion!
We have secured the glorious city of St Petersburg and with it, all the trade in the Baltic!
We are the Master of the Baltic!
With the control of every Baltic Island, land spanning from Copenhagen to St Petersburg, we have proven ourselves to be the master of the Baltic Sea!
Annexation of the North German minors!
We have united all North German people under our flag and many are pressuring their government to join us!
Go beyond the Rhine!
We have to save the North Germans that are under the cruel rule of the French Empire!
The Lithuanian Question.
We claim to be the Baltic Empire but don't even protect every Baltic culture. It's our destiny to do so and we must protect the Lithuanians!
Acceptance of the §gNorth Germanic People§!!
Scandinavia and North Germany often sounds like it's the same place. Now, we're making it official!
We are the Norwegian Empire!
Since the fall of the Viking North Sea Empire in the 11 century, we were looked at with despise and we even lost our naval supremacy. It's time to show to the world the heritage of the Viking!
Claim England!
The North Sea Empire owned England 800 years ago, it's time to claim that land as well and honor our heritage!
The Irish Question
We finally have extend our influence to Ireland, it's time to officialise this territory as ours!
We are Vikings!
Now that we have restored the Norwegian Empire to it's former glory, we can legitimately declare us as true heirs of the Viking legacy!
Acceptance of the British!
Now that we have reclaim north England, it's time to give the local population the same rights as the Danes, and integrate them into the glorious Scandinavian Empire!
Acceptance of §YScotland§!!

Now that we have reclaim Scotland, it's time to give the local population the same rights as the Danes, and integrate them into the glorious Scandinavian Empire! If we accept Scottish, we lose the ability to accept North German
Accept §gthe Slovaks§!!
It's been long since we have occupied Slovak land and it's time to give them citizenship!
Acceptance of the Scottish!
With the reconquest of the Scottish state, we give them citizenship, as we did in the past!
Reintegrate the Rhineland!
The Rhineland has always been a part of the The Holy Roman Empire before the Napoleonic wars and we now possess it once more!
Expansion in Italy!
North Italy is rightfully a part of the Holy Roman Empire and we have to make sure it stays that way!
Glory to the The Holy Roman Empire!
We have united the core territory of the The Holy Roman Empire, it's time to claim all lost land to expand the Empire to it's glorious past borders!
Expansion in the Netherlands!
The Netherlands were historically a part of the The Holy Roman Empire and we have finally recovered them!
Expansion in Switzerland!
The swiss are once again a part of the Holy Roman Empire like they should have stayed!
Finish the Expansion in the Lowlands!
We have finally recovered the Lowlands, a historical region of the Holy Roman Empire taken by the French during the Revolution!
Expansion in Slovenia!
We have recovered the land lost to the Illegitimate Illyrian Duchy!
Form the §YHoly Roman Empire§!!

In 1806, after the battle of Austerliz and the defeat of the Austrian army, Emperor Francis II dissolved the Holy Roman Empire, making it a relic of the past. We have now recovered the legitimacy to recreate it again and put Austria at the center!
Glory to India!
We have finally united India, it's time to make it's people prosper!
Acceptance of the Bengali people!
We own Bengal and it's time to give it's people citizenship!
Acceptance of the south!
We own the south of India, it's time to grant them citizenship!
An Mein Volk!

So wenig fur Mein treues Volk, als fur Deutsche, bedarf es einer Rechenschaft uber die Ursachen des Krieges, welcher jetzt beginnt. Klar liegen dem unverblendeten Europa vor Augen. Wir erlagen der Uebermacht Frankreichs. Der Friede, der die Halfte Meiner Unterthanen mit entriss, gab uns seine Segnungen nicht
French: denn er schlug uns tiefere Wunden als selbst der Krieg. Das Mark des Landes ward ausgesogen, die Hauptfestungen bleiben vom Feinde besetzt, der Ackerbau ward gelahmt, sowie der sonst so hoch gebrachte Kunstfleiss unserer Stadte. Die Freiheit des Handels ward gehemmt und dadurch die Quellen des Erwerbs und des Wohlstandes verstopft. Das Land ward ein Raub der Verarmung. Durch die strengste Erfullung eingegangener Verbindlichkeiten hoffte Ich Meinem Volk Erleichterung zu bereiten, und den franzosischen Kaiser endlich uberzeugen, dass es sein eigener Vortheil sey, Preussen seine Unabhangigkeit zu lassen. Aber Meine reinsten Absichten wurden durch Uebermuth und Treulosigkeit vereitelt, und nur zu deutlich sahen wir, dass des Kaisers Vertrage mehr noch wie seine Kriege uns langsam verderben mussten. Jetzt ist der Augenblick gekommen, wo alle Tauschung yber unsern Zustand aufhort. ? Brandenburger, Preussen, Schlesier, Pommern, Litthauer! Ihr wisst, was Ihr seit fast sieben Jahren erduldet habt
German: Ihr wisst, was euer trauriges Loos ist, wenn wir den beginnenden Kampf nicht ehrenvoll enden. Erinnert Euch an die Vorzeit, an den grossen Kurfursten, den grossen Friedrich. Bleibt eingedenk der Guter, die unter Ihnen Unsere Vorfahren blutig erkampften: Gewissensfreiheit, Ehre, Unabhangigkeit, Handel, Kunstfleiss und Wissenschaft. ? Gedenkt des grossen Beispiels unserer machtigen Verbundeten, der Russen
Polish: gedenkt der Spanier, der Portugiesen. Selbst kleinere Volker sind fur gleiche Guter gegen machtigere Feinde in den Kampf gezogen und haben den Sieg errungen. Erinnert Euch an die heldenmuthigen Schweizer und Niederlander. ? Grosse Opfer werden von allen Standen gefordert werden
Spanish: denn unser Beginnen ist gross, und nicht geringe die Zahl und die Mittel unserer Feinde. Ihr werdet jene lieber bringen fur das Vaterland, fur Euern angeborenen Konig, als fur einen fremden Herrscher, der, wie so viele Beispiele lehren, Eure Sohne und Eure letzten Krafte Zwecken widmen wurde, die Euch ganz fremd sind. Vertrauen auf Gott, Ausdauer, Muth und der machtige Beistand unserer Bundesgenossen werden unsern redlichen Anstrengungen siegreichen Lohn gewahren. ? Aber, welche Opfer auch von Einzelnen gefordert werden mogen, sie wiegen die heiligen Guter nicht auf, fur die wir sie hingeben, fur die wir streiten und siegen mussen, wenn wir nicht aufhoren wollen, Preussen und Deutsche zu seyn. Es ist der letzte, entscheidende Kampf, den wir bestehen, fur unsere Existenz, unsere Unabhangigkeit, unsern Wohlstand. Keinen andern Ausweg gibt es, als einen ehrenvollen Frieden, oder einen ruhmvollen Untergang. Auch diesem wurdet Ihr getrost entgegen gehen, um der Ehre willen
Italian: weil ehrlos der Preusse und der Deutsche nicht zu leben vermag. Allein wir durfen mit Zuversicht vertrauen: Gott und unser fester Wille werden unserer gerechten Sache den Sieg verleihen, mit ihm einen sichern, glorreichen Frieden und die Wiederkehr einer glucklichen Zeit.

English: Unite Iberia!
Now that we are united with Spain and that we have reclaimed the entire peninsula, we can finally claim the union of all Iberians under one flag!
Reclaim Austrian Land!
We have reclaimed true Austrian land that we lost to Bavaria due to Napoleon. Now, nobody can deny our claim again!
§BAnnex Ukraine§!!
After the Ukrainian Revolts, we were forced to accept Ukrainian autonomy.. We are now revoking that privilege!
Acceptance of §BUkrainians§!!
We should give citizenship to the Ukrainian people, they are now a part of our country and should be able to live as true citizens!
Acceptance of §BByelorussians§!!
We should give citizenship to the Byelorussian people, they are now a part of our country and should be able to live as true citizens!
Form the §gKingdom of Burgundy§!!
After hundreds of years of Burgundian servitude under foreign rulers, we, the true successors of Burgundy, have restored our freedom and put a King on the throne.
Give Ukraine to Poland!

Even if we have claimed Ukraine for centuries, we have to accept the new reality and make peace with Poland. Ukraine is unstable and will never be Russian. However, this does open new expansion route...
Unite the §REnglish and Dutch people!§!
Even though our people have long been seperated, there is a great bond between us. The only way to solidify this bond is to unite the two countries into a great Union.
Acceptance of §Ythe southern tribes§!!

After invading our homes centuries ago, nomadic tribes settled down in Caucasia. Now , we rule over them but instead of showing them cruelty for the crimes they commited centuries ago, may be it's time to make peace with them and accept them as a part of our Empire! This will lock you out of accepting other cultures.
Acceptance of §Ythe eastern tribes§!!

The Eastern tribes have always been a problem to ous, but when they collapsed 400 years ago, we didn't stop expanding east. It's time now to accept them as part of our Empire! This will lock you out of accepting other cultures.
Push to §Ythe south§!!

Since Peter the Great, we're looking to get access to warm water. We had Sevastopol in Crimea, but now we have the Persian ports. However, they will never be ours if the local population isn't accepted and doesn't feel like a part of our empire. That's why we should accept them! This will lock you out of accepting other cultures.
Form Zachadia!
We have finally united all western slavs, it's time to form the glorious kingdom of Zapadoslavia!
§RHungarian Subjugation§!!
We should accept the hungarian people, they too have suffered in the hands of the Austrians! This will lock you out of accepting the Baltic people
Form the United States of Greater Austria!
With German and Hungarian population representing only half of the population of our country, it's time to put aside our hate toward the minorities and accept them as a full part of our empire!
Reclaim Constantinople!
We should reclaim the holy city of Constantinople, a city that once shined over all Europe for it's art, technology and was the center of trade in Eastern Europe.
Reform Byzantium!
The once fallen Byzantine empire is back on it's feet, ready to shine once more!
Accept the Bulgar people
Bulgaria was almost always a part of the Byzantine empire and it's people, orthodox like us were citizens. We should give them that citizenship back!
Accept the Albanian people
Albania was almost always a part of the Byzantine empire and it's people, orthodox like us were citizens. We should give them that citizenship back!
Double down in the Balkans
We should continue our conquest of the Balkans and pacify this region by accepting it's people into our empire, granting them privileges and respect!
The conquest of §GSouthern Italy§!
Italy was always a part of the Byzantine Empire and its people were as well. We should make sure that it's the case once more!
The conquest of §RAnatolia§!
Even if the Turks have been our ennemies for 800 years, we should not repeat the same mistakes and move forward by accepting those people in our empire!
The Eastern Christian Kingdoms
The Eastern christian kingdoms known as Georgia and Armenia should be again a part of our empire and their people accepted!
We have united the Pentarchy
After a millenia of differences with werstern christianity, we have finally reunited all 5 holy sites of Christianity, putting the Orthodox faith above all others!
Anatolia reconquered
After centuries, we have finally reconquered Anatolia, a land that was taken from us by the Seljuks, that we tried so hard to reconquer. Now we can rejoice!
Levant reconquered
After centuries, we have finally reconquered the Levant, a land that was taken from us by the Arabs in the 7th century and that we never saw again. Now we can rejoice!
North Africa reconquered
After centuries, we have finally reconquered North Africa, a land that was taken from us by the Arabs in the 7th century and that we never saw again. Now we can rejoice!
South Italy reconquered
After centuries, we have finally reconquered South Italy, a land that was taken from us in 1071 by Normans warlord and that we never saw again. Now we can rejoice!
Balkans reconquered

After centuries, we have finally reconquered the Balkans, a land that we lost during successive wars against Hordes, Catholic kingdoms like Hungary or the 4th Crusade and finally, the Ottomans. We tried hard to get that land back but now we can rejoice!
Accept Bulgars
We should accept our southern brethen, they were subjugated by the Ottomans like us and we should unite with them!
Accept Hungarians
We should accept our western brethens, they were subjugated by Austria like us and we should unite with them!
Romania United
We have united Romania, it's time to work on interior policy!
North Italy reconquered

After centuries, we have finally reconquered North Italy, a land that was taken from us by the barbaric tribes in the 5th century and that we conquered once more during the reign of Justinian, in the 6th century. After that we never saw this terrotiry again. Now we can rejoice!
Eastern Roman Empire United
We have finally united the whole eastern roman empire once again and we should make sure that it will never fall under foreigner again!
The Spanish Reconquista
Due to the incompetency of the previous rulers of Spain, we lost control over South America. However, we are not like the previous rulers. We will surpass them, we will go even further beyond.
El Virreinato del Rio de la Plata
With a considerable foothold in South America established, we are able to exert much more influence on the continent - let the Reconquista continue!
The Rest of the Cone
With the main rebel state, Argentina, destroyed and transformed into a viceroyalty, there's nothing left to do but clean up the rest of the Southern Cone.
Reconquista de Brasil
We're in the process of regaining Spanish lost land in the New World... Wouldn't it be logical, with the Kingdom of Portugal in our Empire, to also recover Portuguese land?
The Caliphate
Proclaiming a united Arab nation is not enough. We must reach for claims that our forefathers held, and become a truly powerful Caliphate.
Arab §GSouth Italy§!?
Many, many years ago, Arab kingdoms owned large parts of South Italy... As the Arabian Nation, should we not go back for 'Iitalia?
The South Italians of Arabia
We have conquered the Kingdom of Naples, and the locals are proving to be cooperative. What if we... gave them autonomy and treated them the same as Arabs?
Reclaim §YAybiria§!!

Six hundred years ago, the Almohad Caliphate was the indisputed ruler of Iberia. That all changed when the Christians of Castile, Navarra and Aragon drove the Caliphate out. Six hundred years of humiliation... will end.
Arab 'Iisbania?
We have reconquered most of Iberia, and the Spanish locals are proving to be cooperative. What if we... gave them autonomy and treated them the same as Arabs?
Take Peru!
Peru, although quite culturally different from Argentina, is still closely related to us by virtue of being a fellow former Spanish colony. It only makes sense to bring them into our fold.
Throw away our differences!
In order to truly be the rulers of South America, we need to throw away the differences that seperate us from our northern brothers.
The §YPan-Lowlands Idea?§!
The Dutch and English nations are now united, but there's something missing... Shouldn't we retake all of what the Netherlands used to be? This will stop us from accepting the Irish.
In order to truly be the rulers of South America, we need to throw away the differences that seperate us from our northern brothers.
Annexation of Spain
Since Joseph got the French throne, Spain has been a vassal in all but name. In fact, we are already running the country. So now its time for us to do it officially by annexing Spain!
Acceptance of the Spaniards

Even if we fought them for years, we need to accept the Spaniards as true citizens of the French Empire. They are our southern brethen and Romance language speakers like us, so we need to put our differences aside and embrace them.
Acceptance of the Spanish minorities
We have accepted the Spaniards in our country, its now time to accept the minorities as well to prevent any ideas of independence and rebellion!
Annexation of Westphalia
Since Jerome got the French throne, Westphalia has been a vassal in all but name. In fact, we are already running the country. So now its time for us to do it officially by annexing Westphalia!
French Ruhr Boom

With the Annexation of the Rhineland, we acquired ourselves a region with great goods and a strong potential. We need to invest to get it to be industrial heartland of the West and to show everyone our power!
Remake the Kingdom of Italy
With the Annexation of the Kingdom of Italy by France in 1826 and the death of Napoleon in 1835, the North of Italy exploded into different factions. It's time to unite them under one flag!
Unite §Bwith Greece§!
The Greeks and Romans shared a lot in common and Greek was a commonly spoken language in southern Italy. We should unite with them to create a Mediterranean power!
Annexation of Libya
We need to secure the central Mediterranean Sea and stop the Arabic pirates. In order to do so, we need to make Libya and Tunisia ours!
Yugoslavia United!
We have united the Yugoslavia, our people can rejoice and thrive!
United Yugoslavia!
We can proclaim the union of balkans people under a new flag with the union of our country and Bosnia!
Unite North Italy
Napoleon had created the Kingdom of Italy, we should unite it again to gain a strong vassal in the area!
Double down in the §BBalkans§!
We should focus on the Balkans expansion and find peace with the Ottomans after so many years of war. We could become a strong land power and make the Ottomans our fleet!
We own Rome!
We have conquered Rome, its our destiny to rule over the Italian peninsula!
Accept the §YOccitans§!
We have conquered the Occitan region. They're our Eastern Breathen and we should make them citizens of our glorious country!
Revive the Latin empire!
We have finally united all Latin speaking people and can declare the resurgence of a Latin identity!
Annex Italian Minors
We should unite every duchy that is in our sphere in order to further our claim on the Italian Throne!
Union of Italy
All Italians around the world can now feel at home in our country!
Italian Heritage
With North Italy under our control, We can claim the Lost Italian Heritage!
Reintegrate the Kingdom of Italy
After the Death of Napoleon, the many Italian principalities broke free as there was no heir for the Italian kingdom throne. But we have found one and can reintegrate Italy now!
Italian Submission
We have reconquered the lost land in Italy. We should however give equal rights to its population to prevent any revolts against our rule
Ask §BFrance§! for support!
We need to ask France for support against the Ottomans.
Ask the §ROttomans§! for support!
We should seek peace with the Ottomans and ask them to help us westernize.
Ask §GRussia§! for support!
Russia as always been an enemy to the Ottomans, they would probably help us.
Cisalpine submission!
For long, the Cisapline people have been a part of the empire. It's time to make them true citizens!
Reintegrate the Netherlands!
Long ago, the Netherlands were integrated into the French Empire. But they broke free after the Death of Napoleon. It's time to get them back in!
Flemish Integration
The Flemish people have been in the empire for years. It's time to make them true citizens of the empire!
Dutch Integration
The Dutch people might try to revolt if we don't accept them into our empire. It's time to do so!
Accept the Cisalpine people!
We have united Italy and should accept every italian!
Choose a Political Focus
We can choose a new political focus, which will last 10 years.
Give Citizenship to a culture!
We have to appease one of the many culture in order to make sure no one revolts
Give Citizenship to a culture!
We have to appease one of the many culture in order to make sure no one revolts
Give Citizenship to a culture!
We have to appease one of the many culture in order to make sure no one revolts
Acceptance of the Rhenish
We should accept the Rhenish people in order to avoid another Rhenish revolt!
Alexandre's Trade Reforms

Seeing how France was left after the Napoleonic wars and the end of Napoleon reign, Alexandre has enacted a lot of reforms to better the working condition of a lot of people as well as the commerce inside the nation
Alexandre's Social Reforms
Continuing his reforms, he significantly improved on the daily life of the people as population is stagnating in France while its exploding in the other parts of Europe
The North German Question
It's time to teach the french way to those german to further their integration inside the empire!
Grant citizenship to the Phillipines
Now that Iberia has been united, let's continue this propagation of citizenship to our last asian colonies, the Phillipines.
Glory to the Spanish Empire!
We have reclaim our long lost land in the Netherlands , we can reestablish the Spanish Empire!
Glory to the Spanish Empire!
Now that we have recovered all of our lost provinces in south Italy and Milan, we can reestablish the Spanish Empire!
Acceptance of §Ythe Mongolians§!
Mongolia is the last steppe that isn't ours. This is the final step in our Eastern plan. Now it's time to integrate them!
§BSouthern Slavs§!
We have always wanted to unite the southern slavs, victims of the Ottomans and Austria. Now we can claim to be the protector of all Slavs!

Hides the Southern Expansion Path

Shows the Western Expansion Path.
Great Germany!
We have finally united all German people, it's a glorious day for our nation!
United §WNetherlands§!
We have finally united all Dutch people!
Expand to Flanders
We have expanded to the Flemish territory, we should accept them to avoid any revolts.
Expand to Wallonia
We have conquered the land of the Wallonians and it's our duty to acccept them as citizens of the old Kingdom of the Netherlands!
Expansion in the North of France
We have conquered the land of the Picards. They are our southern brethen and we should give them citizenship to avoid any revolts.
Form the Slavic Union!

It's common knowledge that we Slavs have many things in common, besides a country. Russians, after the Great Napoleonic Wars, began developing a movement called 'Panslavism'. Due to French influence on the continent and on the Slavic people, the Russians had no way of achieving true Panslavism. With all North Slavs united, and with nobody standing in the way, there is no reason not to proclaim a United Slavic Nation!
The §GIllyrian Question§!
We should probably accept the Illyrian population inside our ranks to prevent any nationalist ideas in those states
The Serbian Question
The Serbs have always been known for their will to fight any opressors. We must act carefully if we don't want to be the target of revolts like the Ottomans were
The Albanian minority
The Albanian are a people we should respect. During Skanderbeg's time, they inflicted many casualties on the Ottomans. If we treat them with respect they might never revolt
Form the Pan-Slavic Union
We have finally united all western Slavs! We are feared by the world as they shall now know the power of the Slavs!
The Franco-Spanish Union

I, Joseph the 1st, King of Spain and Emperor of France, declare that from this day, and until the end of times, the Kingdom of Spain and the Empire of France shall be united under the Franco-Spanish crown! Those two lands often sought union, notably under Louis the XIV but I am the first to achieve it! We will keep the Spanish tradition and flags in the Empire to honor the victory of the Spanish people againt France, but will allow French to be an official language. To the future of both people!
Acceptance of the French minorities

The Picard and Breton people are closer to Spaniards than to the French. They both endured French occupation and seek to regain their liberty. They'll be honored them by accepting them as official languages of the Franco-Spanish Empire!
Accept §Gthe Irish§!
We have ended the reconquest of the British Isles and should accept the Irish people living there!
Acceptance of the Picards
The Picards represent a mix of three people, the French, the English and the Flemish. They are the real symbol of the unity of our country, we should accept them!
Reclaim South Africa
South Africa had been both a Dutch colony and an English colony. We should reclaim it as a true part of our nation!
Expansion into Brittany
The people living in Brittany are closer to us than the French will ever be, it's only logical to accept them
Wales acceptance
Since the departure of the monarchy to Canada, the Welsh have never accepted us. Now it's time to re-unite with them
Expansion into Occitania
The Occitan kingdom was always a part of France. Now that it's ours we should accept the local population as a sign of peace
Expansion into §GIreland§!
The Irish people had been liberated by Napoleon when he invaded Ireland. Now that France no longer exists, we should reintegrate the land and its people
Formation of the Dual Monarchy

The Dual Monarchy is an old British dream to see the nations of France and England united under the English crown. It's first appearance was during the Hundred Years War, during which English kings Edward II and Edward III had a strong claim on the French throne. Now that we have restored our claim on the French kingdom and conquered it, we can officialy proclam the Dual Monarchy! §RYou cannot accept Irish, Anglo-Canadian, Boer or Caribeno if you want to form the Dual Monarchy.
§GAccept the Irish§!
We have ended the reconquest of the British Isles and should accept the Irish people living there!
Reclaim §gSouth Africa§!
South Africa had been both a Dutch colony and an English colony. We should reclaim it as a true part of our nation!
Acceptance of the Welsh
Since the departure of the monarchy to Canada, the Welsh have never accepted us. Now it's time to re-unite with them
§YCaribbean Expansion§!

With the fall of our colonial empire, we must seek new land to conquer in the New World. The Caribbean is a perfect target. We have a strong presence there and no other Great Powers have any significant footholds
The §RQuestion of Canada§!

Canadian land was a part of our Empire, before we gave them their own nation to appease their calls for autonomy. But now that we have consolidated our power, we can annex them back while giving the population equal rights to prevent any revolts
French Heritage
The French Army always has been one of the best in Europe. We should keep that heritage!
Rule Britannia

Rule, Britannia! Britannia, rule the waves! Britons never, never, never shall be slaves. When Britain first, at heaven's command, Arose from out the azure main, This was the charter of the land, And Guardian Angels sang this strain: Rule, Britannia! Britannia, rule the waves! Britons never, never, never shall be slaves. The nations not so blest as thee Must, in their turn, to tyrants fall, While thou shalt flourish great and free: The dread and envy of them all. Rule, Britannia! Britannia, rule the waves! Britons never, never, never shall be slaves. Still more majestic shalt thou rise, More dreadful from each foreign stroke, As the loud blast that tears the skies Serves but to root thy native oak. Rule, Britannia! Britannia, rule the waves! Britons never, never, never shall be slaves. Thee haughty tyrants ne'er shall tame
French: All their attempts to bend thee down Will but arouse thy generous flame, But work their woe and thy renown. Rule, Britannia! Britannia, rule the waves! Britons never, never, never shall be slaves. To thee belongs the rural reign
German: Thy cities shall with commerce shine
Polish: All thine shall be the subject main, And every shore it circles, thine. Rule, Britannia! Britannia, rule the waves! Britons never, never, never shall be slaves. The Muses, still with freedom found, Shall to thy happy coasts repair. Blest isle! with matchless beauty crowned, And manly hearts to guard the fair. Rule, Britannia! Britannia, rule the waves! Britons never, never, never shall be slaves.

English: Another Candidat
We should think to promote others indian to rule over the others. But who are we going to accept?
Form the Indo-British Empire

The East India company has been freed from the surveillance of the United Kingdom. While they were a good and powerful master, they would have tried to take over our conquest sooner or later. Now it's time to fully declare our independance as a sovereign nation and not a company anymore ! We also should accept the bengal population to assistus in the rule over India, they have proven their loyalty!
Form the Indo-British Empire

The East India company has been freed from the surveillance of the United Kingdom. While they were a good and powerful master, they would have tried to take over our conquest sooner or later. Now it's time to fully declare our independance as a sovereign nation and not a company anymore ! We also should accept the bengal population to assistus in the rule over India, they have proven their loyalty!
Our Welsh Brethen
The welsh people belong to the celtic heritage. So it's only normal to integrate them into the Celtic Union
Portuguese Civil Code

In 1867, the first Portuguese Civil Code was enacted. Professor Seabra, influenced by the Code Napoleon, wrote the whole Code alone. Other Codifications were also studied and taken into consideration, especially the Allgemeines Landrecht (Prussia), the ABGB (Austria) and the Sardinian Civil Code. But he was able to create a very peculiar style: the systematization is different from the French Code. The Portuguese Civil Code was unique for European civil codes, in its characterization of laws in terms of the person and property. It was divided into four sections: the person, the acquisition of goods, goods, and the defense of those goods or rights.
Establish the civil guard
Our citizen deserves protections after the many wars that affected them, especially the napoleonic wars
The regeneration
After the Napoleonic wars Portugal must recover and move forward. It's time to think about our wounds
Form §GPortugal-Brazil§!
Brazil has always been our best colony since the discovery of America and the establishment of portuguese settlers in the area. It's the heritage of the treaty of Tordesillas and it should be ours
Brazil is united !
We have finally united the brazilian people after years of wars. We can bring peace and prosperity to our people !
Take Texas
The land of cows and cowboys is ours. (fuck the description, I don't live there)
Form the Hispanic Commonwealth
Long ago Spain was the 1st world power and America was in our hands. Now, decades after the revolt in our ex colonies, we have finally taken them back and have united all spanish speaking people !
Annex Bolivia
After many years under our rule and with a constant effort to centralise our country, we can finally annex Bolivia as a part of our country
Form The Mexican Empire

With the conquest of the USCA we have gained the legiticamy to make Agustin de Iturbide our emperor. He shall rule the Mexican Empire like modern kings, with a parliement. There is no doubts that he will lead us to a glorious future !
French: Apr?s une intervention militaire fran?aise, d?clench?e par l'annulation par le Mexique de remboursements d'emprunts en 1861, l'archiduc autrichien Maximilien Ferdinand, a acc?d? au tr?ne et r?tabli l'Empire mexicain sous le nom de Maximilien Ier. Au cours de son r?gne, qui ne dura que trois ann?es, Maximilien b?n?ficia d'un certain soutien de la part des conservateurs mexicains. En demandant ? Maximilien Ferdinand de monter sur le tr?ne, nous pourrons r?tablir la monarchie mexicaine, mais une telle entreprise n'est pas sans risque...
German: Durch eine franz?sische Milit?rintervention in Mexiko im Jahr 1861, ausgel?st durch Mexikos Zahlungsr?ckst?nde, brachte den ?sterreichischen Erzherzog Maximilian Ferdinand, sp?ter Maximilian I., auf den Thron des restaurierten mexikanischen Kaiserreichs. Dieses Kaiserreich w?hrte zwar nur drei Jahre, aber Maximilian wurde zu gewissem Grad trotzdem von den mexikanischen Konservativen unterst?tzt. Indem wir Maximilian Ferdinand anbieten, k?nnen wir Mexiko wieder zu einer Monarchie machen, aber dies w?re ein ?u?erst riskantes Unterfangen.
Spanish: Una intervenci?n militar francesa en M?jico, causada por la cancelaci?n de los pagos de los cr?ditos en 1861, hizo que el archiduque austriaco, Fernando Maximiliano, posteriormente Maximiliano I, se instalase en el trono de un restaurado Imperio Mejicano. Aunque el imperio solo dur? tres a?os, Maximiliano disfrut? de cierto nivel de apoyo por parte de los conservadores mejicanos. Al pedir a Fernando Maximiliano que subiese al trono, podr?amos volver a convertir a M?jico en una monarqu?a, aunque se tratar?a de un asunto muy arriesgado.

English: Claim §GNorth Italy§!
We can finally press our claim on North Italy! If we accept North Italian and form the Austro-Bavarian Union, we lose the ability to form Germany.
Accept all German
We have chosen a true German king who served with Prussia. Now it's time to accept all german as citizens of Bavaria !
Dutch Heritage
With the Dutch core territory under our control, we can claim the dutch heritage of commerce and maritime power !
The Conquest of New England
New England has always been shared between Canada and the USA. Now we can fully proclaim that it's ours !
Accept Yankee
We have subjugated the Yankees and in order to increase stability, we should accept them in our glorious country
End the 13 colonies
The 13 colonies were originally a puppet state of the UNited Kingdom like we were. But contrary to us, they were a rebllious nation and freed themseleves. It's time to end this abomination
Fomr the North American Union
English North America is finally united under one country and we can now move forward to new horizon !
Not a Vassal
Fuck of, we're free now (not that this isn't supposed to be used if UK doesn't agree, kick the player if he does it)
Imperialism or Isolasionism ?

The United States of America have always had an ambigious relation with Europe. While we are making most of our money from trade with Europe and shared a lot of ideology with the old continent, we have always had a different approach on colonisalism as a former colony. It's also important to note that the recent conflict against european power have pushed us to take a decision on our foreign diplomacy. Should we focus on America and renounce the idea of imperialism or should we embrace our european heritage ?
§GSouthern Destiny§!
After the conquest of the West, it's only logical that our destiny lies south. Take this dye and make me a new carpet at home !
Monroe's Doctrine

The occasion has been judged proper for asserting, as a principle in which the rights and interests of the United States are involved, that the American continents, by the free and independent condition which they have assumed and maintain, are henceforth not to be considered as subjects for future colonization by any European powers
Form the Austro-Bavarian Empire
Bavaria and Austria have always been close countries. Now we can proclaim their union !
Host Nation Options
This spawns a menu that allows you to ally every nation or kick specific players
Louis Bonaparte
Louis Bonaparte, the Rabbit of the Netherlands, is Napoleon's youngest brother. Considered a lunatic by some, he is nevertheless well-liked by the people of Holland.
Jerome Bonaparte

Jerome Bonaparte is Napoleon's brother and the King of Westphalia. His experience in ruling, confirmed blood relation to Napoleon and an already vast German domain make Hieronymus an excellent choice to succeed his brother.
Alexandre Walewski

Alexandre is Napoleon's purported bastard son. Due to him being considered an "outsider", he might achieve some level of popularity with the ethnic minorities that reside in the frontiers of the French Empire - surely not as much as a hypothetical Second Republic would.
The Second Republic
There is no man, or woman, suitable to succeed Napoleon as despot of France! Our only reasonable option is to give power back to the people and let God take the wheel.
Maximilien de Beauharnais

Maximilien de Beauharnais is the son of Italian vice-roy Eugene de Beauharnais. Although he's  currently only Duke of Lombardy, the nation of France might have better relations with the people of North Italy if Maximilien recovers his father's domain while reigning as Emperor of France.
Marie Louise

Marie Louise, Duchess of Parma is Napoleon's widow. Despite being past child-bearing age, many European monarchs would happily accept a political marriage with her in the hopes of securing prestige or an alliance with France's military might.
Accept Flanders
The people of Flanders are closely related to the people of Wallonia, who are closely related to the people of France. What further justification could we want?
Accept the Rhineland
The Rhineland, despite being a recent acquisition, is assimilating quite well. French standards and fashion have permeated Rhenish society.
Accept Catalonia
Catalonia has always been closely related to France, but for ages has been ruled by oppressive Spanish rulers. Catalan people view us as saviors.
Accept Arpitania
Despite Arpitania not being as francized as other territories we've conquered, locals are generally receptive to cooperating with the Second Republic.
Form the Imperial Federation!
To prevent our Empire from splintering again, this time we will accept the foreigners as true citizens of the Imperial Federation.
Carthago Delenda Est
We have much in common with North African people, and as such we shall integrate them into the glorious Roman Empire!
Form the Roman League
In the wake of Napoleon's triumph and the reshaping of Europe, the idea of a new Roman League has gained traction among the enlightened leaders of your nation.
